price: هغوى وويل: ای نوحه! كه ته له دې (خبرو) منع نه شوې نو خامخا به له ويشتل شويو څخه شې.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
